name: Home Depot
title: Home Decoration Manufacturer full-stack Website
description: ● Buyers can pay through Stripe payment system.
● Admin can add new product  & can delete any existing  product.
● Admin  can  ship the paid order & can delete  any unpaid order.
● Admin can change other  users’ status to admin.

name: Gadget Arena
title: Warehouse Management  Website for Gadget Accessories
description: ● Users can update products by adding quantities & delivering it.
● Users can add a new item and also can delete any existing item.
● On the My Items tab user can items added by him

name: James Clear
title: Website for Writer and Influencer James Clear
description: ● Users can buy any James Clear service by clicking the Checkout Button of the respective service.
● On the Checkout Tab users will provide the necessary information to proceed the checkout.
● Firebase authentication for email-password and google sign-in.

name: Islamicademy
title: Online Educational platform for Islamic Studies
description: ● Users can see detail info of any enlisted courses by clicking the Detail Button of the respective course.
● On the Detail section users will be provided the necessary information to proceed the enrollment.
● Firebase authentication for email-password and google sign-in.
● Profile section will give a vibe of social media impression.
